Class Application

java.lang.Object
model.Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents a student application for an internship. Manages application status and withdrawal requests. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers, not models (MVC compliance).
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(Internship internship, Student applicant, LocalDateTime dateApplied)
      Constructs a new Application with the specified details. Automatically assigns a unique ID and adds to the global application list. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers (MVC compliance).
      Parameters:
      internship - The internship being applied for
      applicant - The student submitting the application
      dateApplied - The date and time of application submission

    • Application

      private Application(int id, Internship internship, Student student, LocalDateTime dateApplied, ApplicationStatus status, ApplicationStatus previousStatus, String withdrawalReason)
      Private constructor for CSV loading. Allows setting all fields including ID, status, and withdrawal information.
      Parameters:
      id - Application ID
      internship - The internship
      student - The student
      dateApplied - Application date
      status - Current status
      previousStatus - Previous status
      withdrawalReason - Withdrawal reason

  • Method Details

    • getAllApplications

      public static List<Application> getAllApplications()
      Get all applications from in-memory list. Note: Loading from CSV is handled by controllers/repositories (MVC compliance).
      Returns:
      list of all applications

    • clearAll

      public static void clearAll()
      Clears all applications from memory. Used by CSV handlers when reloading data.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the unique application ID.
      Returns:
      the unique application ID

    • getStatus

      public ApplicationStatus getStatus()
      Gets the current application status.
      Returns:
      the current status

    • getApplicant

      public Student getApplicant()
      Gets the student who submitted this application.
      Returns:
      the student who applied

    • getInternship

      public Internship getInternship()
      Gets the internship that was applied for.
      Returns:
      the internship applied for

    • getDateApplied

      public LocalDateTime getDateApplied()
      Gets the date and time when the application was submitted.
      Returns:
      the date and time of application

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(ApplicationStatus status)
      Sets the status of this application. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers (MVC compliance).
      Parameters:
      status - The new status to set

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal(String reason)
      Requests withdrawal of this application. Students can request withdrawal for PENDING, SUCCESSFUL, or ACCEPTED applications. Stores the previous status for potential rejection of withdrawal. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers (MVC compliance).
      Parameters:
      reason - Optional reason for withdrawal
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if application status does not allow withdrawal

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal()
      Requests withdrawal without providing a reason. Delegates to requestWithdrawal(String) with null reason.

    • getWithdrawalReason

      public String getWithdrawalReason()
      Gets the reason provided for withdrawal request.
      Returns:
      The withdrawal reason, or null if not applicable

    • approveWithdrawal

      public void approveWithdrawal()
      Approves a withdrawal request. Sets status to WITHDRAWN and updates internship filled slots if necessary. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers (MVC compliance).
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if application is not in WITHDRAWAL_REQUESTED status

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public void rejectWithdrawal()
      Rejects a withdrawal request. Restores the application to its previous status. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers (MVC compliance).
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if application is not in WITHDRAWAL_REQUESTED status

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this application.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      Formatted string with application details

    • getAllApplicationsList

      public static List<Application> getAllApplicationsList()
      Gets the internal list of all applications. Used by CSV handler for persistence operations.
      Returns:
      The list of all applications

    • getNextID

      public static int getNextID()
      Gets the next available ID.
      Returns:
      The next ID to be assigned

    • setNextID

      public static void setNextID(int id)
      Sets the next ID value. Used by CSV handler when loading from file.
      Parameters:
      id - The new next ID value

    • createForCsv

      public static Application createForCsv(int id, Internship internship, Student student, LocalDateTime dateApplied, ApplicationStatus status, ApplicationStatus previousStatus, String withdrawalReason)
      Factory method for creating applications from CSV data. Used by CSV handler to reconstruct applications with all fields.
      Parameters:
      id - Application ID
      internship - The internship
      student - The student
      dateApplied - Application date
      status - Current status
      previousStatus - Previous status (for withdrawal tracking)
      withdrawalReason - Withdrawal reason
      Returns:
      A new Application instance

    • getPreviousStatus

      public ApplicationStatus getPreviousStatus()
      Gets the previous status value. Used by CSV handler for persistence.
      Returns:
      The previous status, or null if not applicable
